title: Fact Check: Picture of a truck beaming visuals of Ram Mandir ‘bhoomi pujan’ in Israel is misleading | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
A post is being shared on social media with a claim that on the day of Ram Mandir ‘bhoomi pujan’ in Ayodhya, a truck in Israel was displaying visuals of Ram Mandir.

Link to the above post.

More such posts can be seen here, here and here.

NewsMobile fact checked the post and found the claim to be misleading.

We ran a keyword search and found a similar video on Facebook.

The video was posted by a Facebook page Hindu Council Australia on August 5, 2020, and the caption read, “Jai Shree Ram. We installed a huge billboard in Blacktown Council car park next to the civic centre from 9 am to 8 PM. Huge Media Screen beaming many programs including a live program from Shri Ayodhya Dham.”

We scanned through the page and found a video featuring a similar truck with billboards.

NewsMobile reached out to Hindu Council of Australia, who confirmed to us that the video is from Australia.

“Yes this is from Australia and copyrights belongs to us,” they told NewsMobile.

Hence, based on this, we can conclude that the video is from Australia and not Israel.
